markdownRemark.html:
One of the most awesome stories on an incident of Linux system debugging I have seen in a LONG time.

But I dont think it was cosmic rays after all !

Also a parable on why linux is so awesome.

frontmatter.title: A year as an entrepreneur (and half, trying to)
